description: This table includes information about member effective periods for outgoing PCP capitation transactions.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the transaction record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: MEMBER_EFF_DATE
columns.description: The member's effective dates on the coverage that were used to pay the capitation.

columns.name: MEMBER_TERM_DATE
columns.description: The member's termination dates on the coverage that were used to pay capitation.
